article_title: Face the Terror Problem Honestly and Firmly
article_text: Your editorial “The President Plays Defense” (Dec. 7) is appropriate in calling out the weakness of President Obama’s 13-minute Oval Office speech, but frankly you were far too kind. The president’s track record on civilization’s global war with radical Islamists is a failure beyond comprehension. First he tells the world ISIS is a JV team. Now ISIS is a threat to global order. Then he tells us that ISIS is “contained” the same day of the horrific attacks on Paris.
